purpleculture_pinyin:
qí
divergent; side road
расходящиеся; тротуар
purpleculture_info:
Synonym: 比方 比如 例如 譬喻
Pictophonetic: 支 indicates the sound; 止 (stop) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
分歧 [ fēn qí ]: divergent; difference (of opinion, position); disagreement; bifurcation (math.)
歧视 [ qí shì ]: to discriminate against; discrimination
种族歧视 [ zhǒng zú qí shì ]: racial discrimination; racism
歧途 [ qí tú ]: fork in a road; wrong road
误入歧途 [ wù rù qí tú ]: to take a wrong step in life (idiom); to go astray
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
    • 支 [ zhī ] to support, to sustain; to withdraw, to pay; a branch (of a bank)
heisig_chinese_memo: A fork in the road is where you have to stop and choose which direction to branch off into.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A fork in the road is where you have to stop and choose which direction to branch off into.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " stop ", the sound of " branch " indicates a fork in the road. Jin Zuosi "Fu of the Capital of Shu": "Xihe False Path in Junqi, Yang Bird's Wings Are High."

" Different " can mean that the same thing is divided into two branches. "Lie Zi‧ Shuo Fu": "There are differences in the forked road. I don't know what to do, so the opposite is true."

" Discrimination " also refers to other channels than formal or legitimate channels. "Book of Old Tang-Wei Ao Biography": "I don't believe in the times, but I'm not convinced by the decree of the time.

" Qi " also said there is a difference. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long-Interpretation Fu": "Zan said: Fu comes from "The Poetry", different schools."
humanum_short_description_en: From " stop ", the sound of " branch " indicates a fork in the road.
humanum_full_description:
從「止」，「支」聲，表示岔路。晉左思〈蜀都賦〉：「羲和假道於峻歧，陽鳥迴翼乎高標。」

　　「歧」可表示同一物分而為兩支。《列子‧說符》：「歧路之中又有歧焉，吾不知所之，所以反也。」

　　「歧」也指正式或正當途徑以外的其它途徑。《舊唐書‧韋澳傳》：「吾不為時相所信，忽自宸旨，委以使務，必以吾他歧得之，何以自明？」

　　「歧」還表示有差別。南朝梁劉勰《文心雕龍‧詮賦》：「贊曰：賦自《詩》出，分歧異派。」

" Different" can mean that the same thing is divided into two branches. "Lie Zi‧ Shuo Fu": "There are differences in the forked road. I don't know what to do, so the opposite is true." " Discrimination" also refers to other channels than formal or legitimate channels. "Book of Old Tang-Wei Ao Biography": "I don't believe in the times, but I'm not convinced by the decree of the time. " Qi" also said there is a difference. The Southern Dynasties Liang Liu Xie's "Wen Xin Diao Long-Interpretation Fu": "Zan said: Fu comes from "The Poetry", different schools."

歧字的基本解释

歧
qí
岔道，偏离正道的小路：歧途（岔道，喻错误的道路，如“误入歧歧”）。
不相同，不一致：歧义。歧视。

歧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qí］
［《廣韻》巨支切，平支，羣。］
(1)岔路。
(2)指走入歧途。
(3)指正式或正当途径以外的其它途径。
(4)同一物分而为两支，分叉。
(5)不同，不一致，有差别。
(6)聪颖。参见“歧嶷”、“歧秀”。
(7)见“歧歧”。

歧字的英文翻译

◎ 歧
branch, divergent, fork

歧字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【止字部】　歧； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页576第02
【廣韻】巨支切【集韻】翹移切，?音祁。【集韻】同跂。足多指也。或作枝。　又歧路也。【顏延之·赭白馬賦】臨歧矩步。【註】歧，歧路也。《爾雅》曰：二達謂之歧。【後漢·張堪傳】麥穗兩歧。【註】一莖兩穂，如歧路之二達。　又歧歧，飛行貌。【潘岳·笙賦】翾翾歧歧。　通作岐。　又【玉篇】古文?字。註詳邑部四畫。

歧字的源字形

歧字的起名意思

：岔道，偏离正道的小路；不相同，不一致。

Divergence
Basic explanation of words
Divergence
qí
Forked roads, small roads that deviate from the right way: wrong roads (forked roads, misleading roads, such as "stray into a divergence").
Not the same, inconsistent: ambiguity. Discrimination.
Divergence
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qí］
["Guangyun" huge branch cut, flat branch, group. ]
(1) Fork roads.
(2) Refers to going astray.
(3) Refers to other channels other than formal or legitimate channels.
(4) The same thing is divided into two branches, branching.
(5) Different, inconsistent, and different.
(6) Smart. See "Qiyi", "Qixiu".
(7) See "Different".

branch, divergent, fork

[Note] Forked, forked. "Erya" says: Erda is different. [Later Han·Zhang Kan Biography] There are two differences in wheat ears. [Note] One stem and two husks, like the second of a bifurcated road.　Different again, flying appearance. 【Pan Yue·Sheng Fu】Yi Yi Qi Qi.　Pass for disagreement.　[Yu Pian] Ancient Chinese? Character. Расхождение
qí
I сущ.
1) ответвление дороги, побочный путь,
大道以多歧亡羊 если у большой дороги много ответвлений, овцы теряются (см. 歧路亡羊)
2) ошибочный, неправильный, неверный
歧途 неверный путь
3) вм. 跂 (шестипалая нога)
